# Gymbo

> Fitness management app for independent personal trainers — clients, sessions, payments, and punch cards in one offline-capable web app. India-first. Mobile apps coming soon.

## Product
- [Landing page](https://getgymbo.com) - Overview of features, how it works, and waitlist
- [Web app](https://app.getgymbo.com) - Live trainer dashboard (login required)

## Features
- Client management — roster, session history, balance tracking
- Punch cards — session bundles (10, 20, or custom sessions) with automatic deduction
- Payments — UPI, cash, and card logging; running balances; invoice generation
- Offline-first — full functionality without internet; auto-syncs on reconnect
- Phone login — OTP-based, no passwords

## Audience
Independent personal trainers in India who manage their own clients without a gym affiliate.

## Status
Web app is live at app.getgymbo.com. Android and iOS mobile apps are in development. Waitlist open at getgymbo.com/#waitlist.

## Contact
hello@getgymbo.com
